Title: Requires certain peace officers to issue an appearance ticket, summon or arrest any person offending the provisions of article 26 of the agriculture and markets law
Summary: Requires certain peace officers to issue an appearance ticket, summon or arrest and bring before the appropriate court any person offending the provisions of article 26 of the agriculture and markets law.
LawCode: Amd ยง371, Ag & Mkts L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the agriculture and markets law, in relation to the powers of peace officers
